mission.text: Shivalik College's mission is to provide promising career opportunities that justify the excellence of our bright students. With our rigorous courses in engineering, pharmacy, and management, we equip top talent professionals with global industry standards.
mission.description: Our placement cell prepares students for internships, collaborative training programs, and practical experience, helping them build a successful future. We have partnered with more than 500 College recruiter partners and have strong alliances with top companies such as Disney+ Hotstar, AutoDesk, BP, Amazon, Infosys, Google, Capgemini, Ola, Wipro, and many more.
